desc: Contribute to the development of frontend solutions, leveraging expertise in React.js and associated technologies. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the seamless integration of systems. Participate in code reviews, debugging sessions, and continuous improvement initiatives to enhance product quality and performance

Led development of a MERN-based platform connecting investors and entrepreneurs, focusing on community engagement.Architected the platform, ensuring functionality, and provided ongoing support for seamless operation. Developed native iOS and Android applications using React from scratch, expanding platform accessibility.

A complete solution, the AI-enabled FinTech B2B Invoice Management Application uses Flask as the backend framework for providing machine learning models. The application effortlessly incorporates a Flask-powered model to estimate invoice order amounts, revolutionising financial operations for businesses with React.js as the front end, MySQL as the database, and Material UI with Tailwind CSS for UI design.

During the 8 weeks of the Virtual Internship, I have completed the following Salesforce Trailhead modules: Salesforce Fundamentals, Organizational Setup, Relationship & Process Automation, Types Of Flows & Security, Apex, Testing & Debugging, VS Code Setup & CLI Setup, Lightning Web Components (LWC) & API, Developer Super Set
